mutants.code:
def octal_to_bin(octal_num):
    decimal = int(octal_num, 9)
    binary = bin(decimal).replace('0b', '')
    return binary

def octal_to_bin(octal_num):
    decimal = int(octal_num, 7)
    binary = bin(decimal).replace('0b', '')
    return binary

def octal_to_bin(octal_num):
    decimal = int(octal_num, 0)
    binary = bin(decimal).replace('0b', '')
    return binary

def octal_to_bin(octal_num):
    decimal = int(octal_num, 1)
    binary = bin(decimal).replace('0b', '')
    return binary

def octal_to_bin(octal_num):
    decimal = int(octal_num, -8)
    binary = bin(decimal).replace('0b', '')
    return binary

def octal_to_bin(octal_num):
    decimal = int(octal_num, 8)
    binary = bin(decimal).replace('', '')
    return binary

def octal_to_bin(octal_num):
    decimal = int(octal_num, 8)
    binary = bin(decimal).replace('0b', 'MUTATED')
    return binary
